OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Net
OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.description: Rental expense for the reporting period incurred under operating leases, including minimum and any contingent rent expense, net of related sublease income.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), before Reclassification, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax and before reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification of gain (loss) from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativesQ.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivatives Qualifying as Hedges, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativesQ.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI on Derivatives, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income of accumulated gain (loss) realized from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherCostOfOperatingRevenue.label: Other Cost of Operating Revenue
OtherCostOfOperatingRevenue.description: Other costs incurred during the reporting period related to other revenue generating activities.

OtherCostOfServices.label: Other Cost of Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OtherCostOfServices.description: Other costs incurred and are directly related to services rendered by an entity during the reporting period.

OtherDirectCostsOfHotels.label: Other Direct Costs of Hotels (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OtherDirectCostsOfHotels.description: Other costs incurred and are directly related to hotel operations.

OtherHotelOperatingRevenue.label: Other Hotel Operating Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OtherHotelOperatingRevenue.description: Amount of revenue, generated from managing and operating hotels, classified as other.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonrecurringExpense.label: Other Nonrecurring Expense
OtherNonrecurringExpense.description: Amount of other expense that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.

OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.label: Other Operating Activities, Cash Flow Statement
OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.description: Other cash or noncash adjustments to reconcile net income to cash provided by (used in) operating activities that are not separately disclosed in the statement of cash flows (for example, cash received or cash paid during the current period for miscellaneous operating activities, net change during the reporting period in other assets or other liabilities).

PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Redemptions
PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to redemptions and adjustments to redemption value. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsRedeemed.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Redeemed
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsRedeemed.description: The number of units redeemed during the year of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.label: Payments for Capital Improvements
PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of or capital improvements to properties held for investment (operating, managed, leased) or for use.

PaymentsForDepositsOnRealEstateAcquisiti.label: Payments for Deposits on Real Estate Acquisitions
PaymentsForDepositsOnRealEstateAcquisiti.description: Cash outflow related to amounts given in advance to show or confirm an intention to complete an acquisition of land, buildings, other structures, or any item classified as real estate.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromPreviousAcquisiti.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Previous Acquisition
PaymentsForProceedsFromPreviousAcquisiti.description: The net cash inflow or outflow associated with the aggregate amount of adjustment to the purchase price of a previous acquisition.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfPreferredStockAnd.label: Payments for Repurchase of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfPreferredStockAnd.description: The cash outflow to reacquire preferred stock during the period.

PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.label: Payments of Capital Distribution
PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.description: Cash outflow to owners or shareholders, excluding ordinary dividends. Includes special dividends.

PaymentsOfDebtExtinguishmentCosts.label: Payment for Debt Extinguishment or Debt Prepayment Cost
PaymentsOfDebtExtinguishmentCosts.description: Amount of cash outflow for cost from early extinguishment and prepayment of debt. Includes, but is not limited to, third-party cost, premium paid, and other fee paid to lender directly for debt extinguishment or debt prepayment. Excludes accrued interest.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsOfDividendsPreferredStockAndPref.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsPreferredStockAndPref.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to preferred shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.label: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-based Payment Arrangement
PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.description: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

PaymentsToAcquireAdditionalInterestInSub.label: Payments to Acquire Additional Interest in Subsidiaries
PaymentsToAcquireAdditionalInterestInSub.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of noncontrolling interest during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Gross
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period. The cash portion only of the acquisition price.

PaymentsToAcquireCommercialRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Commercial Real Estate
PaymentsToAcquireCommercialRealEstate.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of property as primarily intended to generate income for its owner.

PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Equity Method Investments
PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of or advances to an equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

PaymentsToAcquireProjects.label: Payments to Acquire Projects
PaymentsToAcquireProjects.description: The cash outflow from the amount invested for projects in hopes of getting a future return or interest from it.

PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.label: Payments to Noncontrolling Interests
PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash outflow to a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but not limited to, reduction of noncontrolling interest ownership. Excludes dividends paid to the noncontrolling interest.

PreferredStockDividendRatePercentage.label: Preferred Stock, Dividend Rate, Percentage
PreferredStockDividendRatePercentage.description: The percentage rate used to calculate dividend payments on preferred stock.

PreferredStockDividendsIncomeStatementIm.label: Preferred Stock Dividends, Income Statement Impact
PreferredStockDividendsIncomeStatementIm.description: The amount of preferred stock dividends that is an adjustment to net income apportioned to common stockholders.

PreferredStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.label: Preferred Stock, Dividends Per Share, Declared
PreferredStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.description: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of preferred stock outstanding.

PreferredStockLiquidationPreference.label: Preferred Stock, Liquidation Preference Per Share
PreferredStockLiquidationPreference.description: The per share liquidation preference (or restrictions) of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) that has a preference in involuntary liquidation considerably in excess of the par or stated value of the shares. The liquidation preference is the difference between the preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the share.

PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

PreOpeningCosts.label: Pre-Opening Costs
PreOpeningCosts.description: Expenditures associated with opening new locations which are noncapital in nature and expensed as incurred.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfNotesReceivable.label: Proceeds from Collection of Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromCollectionOfNotesReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with principal collections from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromContributionsFromParent.label: Proceeds from Contributions from Parent
ProceedsFromContributionsFromParent.description: The cash inflow from parent as a source of financing that is recorded as additional paid in capital.

ProceedsFromDepositsOnRealEstateSales.label: Proceeds from Deposits on Real Estate Sales
ProceedsFromDepositsOnRealEstateSales.description: Cash inflow related to amounts received in advance from a potential buyer showing or confirming an intention to complete an acquisition of land, buildings, other structures, or any item classified as real estate.

ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution, Return of Capital
ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return of investment, classified as investing activities. Excludes distribution for return on investment, classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.label: Proceeds from Income Tax Refunds
ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.description: The amount of cash received during the period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.description: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholders and which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Secured Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash inflow from amounts received from issuance of long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt secured debt.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSeniorLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Senior Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSeniorLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing with the highest claim on the assets of the entity in case of bankruptcy or liquidation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer).

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfUnsecuredDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Unsecured Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfUnsecuredDebt.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of long-term debt that is not secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt unsecured debt.

ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

ProceedsFromLongTermLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Long-term Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLongTermLinesOfCredit.description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.label: Proceeds from Noncontrolling Interests
ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash inflow from a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, purchase of additional shares or other increase in noncontrolling interest ownership.

ProceedsFromPaymentsToMinorityShareholde.label: Proceeds from (Payments to) Noncontrolling Interests
ProceedsFromPaymentsToMinorityShareholde.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from (to) a noncontrolling interest. Excludes dividends paid to the noncontrolling interest.

ProceedsFromSaleOfBuildings.label: Proceeds from Sale of Buildings
ProceedsFromSaleOfBuildings.description: The cash inflow from sale of buildings.

ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Equity Method Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.description: Cash received from the sale of real estate that is held for investment, that is, it is part of an investing activity during the period.

ProceedsFromSalesOfAssetsInvestingActivi.label: Proceeds from Sales of Assets, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromSalesOfAssetsInvestingActivi.description: Aggregate cash proceeds received from a combination of transactions that are classified as investing activities in which assets, which may include one or more investments, are sold to third-party buyers. This element can be used by entities to aggregate proceeds from all asset sales that are classified as investing activities.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciation.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciation.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation pertaining to real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationAmou.label: SEC Schedule III, Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Amount of Encumbrances
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationAmou.description: Amount of lien or mortgage outstanding on real estate investment properties for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Building and Improvements, Amount
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of buildings and improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Land, Amount
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.description: Amount of land for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Initial Cost of Building and Improvements
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.description: Initial cost of buildings and improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Initial Cost of Land
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.description: Initial cost of land for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateFederalIncomeTaxBasis.label: SEC Schedule III, Real Estate, Federal Income Tax Basis
RealEstateFederalIncomeTaxBasis.description: Cost basis of real estate investments for federal income tax purposes for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateGrossAtCarryingValue.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Gross
RealEstateGrossAtCarryingValue.description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation, of real estate investment by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate. Excludes real estate not held as investment or interest.

RealEstateImprovements.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Improvements
RealEstateImprovements.description: Amount of increase in real estate investments related to improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.description: The cumulative amount of depreciation for real estate property held for investment purposes.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAtCost.label: Real Estate Investment Property, at Cost
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAtCost.description: Amount of real estate investment property which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Net
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.description: Amount of real estate investment property, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealEstateInvestmentsUnconsolidatedRealE.label: Real Estate Investments, Unconsolidated Real Estate and Other Joint Ventures
RealEstateInvestmentsUnconsolidatedRealE.description: The carrying amount of investments in unconsolidated real estate and other joint ventures not separately presented. This includes direct and indirect investments.

RealEstateOtherAcquisitions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Other Acquisition
RealEstateOtherAcquisitions.description: Amount of increase in real estate investments from acquisitions other than through foreclosure for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateTaxesAndInsurance.label: Real Estate Taxes and Insurance
RealEstateTaxesAndInsurance.description: The aggregate total of real estate taxes and insurance expense.

RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.label: Related Party Transaction, Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.description: Expenses recognized resulting from transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

RelatedPartyTransactionSellingGeneralAnd.label: Related Party Transaction, Selling, General and Administrative Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionSellingGeneralAnd.description: Amount of selling, general and administrative expenses resulting from transactions, excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements, with related party.

RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Long-term Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit.description: The cash outflow for the settlement of obligation drawn from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfUnsecuredDebt.label: Repayments of Unsecured Debt
RepaymentsOfUnsecuredDebt.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is not secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt unsecured debt.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Excluding Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.description: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

RevenueFromLeasedAndOwnedHotels.label: Revenue from Hotels (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
RevenueFromLeasedAndOwnedHotels.description: Amount, net of promotional allowances, of revenue from managing and operating hotels, including, but not limited to, revenue from occupancy, casino, food and beverage, and retail. Excludes operating lease income.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAccumulatedDepre.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Depreciation Expense
SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAccumulatedDepre.description: Amount of depreciation expense of real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAndAccumulatedDe.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Cost Capitalized Subsequent to Acquisition, Building and Improvements
SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAndAccumulatedDe.description: Amount of building and improvement costs capitalized since acquisition for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAndAccumulatedDe.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Cost Capitalized Subsequent to Acquisition, Land
SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAndAccumulatedDe.description: Amount of land costs capitalized since acquisition for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

SecuredDebt.label: Secured Debt
SecuredDebt.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

ServiceManagementCosts.label: Service Management Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
ServiceManagementCosts.description: The aggregate costs related to delivering management services during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Accelerated Cost
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount of additional cost recognized for award under share-based payment arrangement from occurrence of event accelerating recognition of cost.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Forfeited in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that were forfeited during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of grants made during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of non-vested equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that validly exist and are outstanding as of the balance sheet date.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Per share or unit weighted-average fair value of nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that vested during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate, Maximum
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The maximum risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Additional Shares Authorized
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of additional shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Shares Authorized
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

SharesIssuedPricePerShare.label: Shares Issued, Price Per Share
SharesIssuedPricePerShare.description: Per share or per unit amount of equity securities issued.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityNoteSpinoffTransaction.label: Stockholders' Equity Note, Spinoff Transaction
StockholdersEquityNoteSpinoffTransaction.description: The change in equity as a result of a spin-off transaction (a regular or reverse spin-off) which is based on the recorded amounts.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.description: Number of new stock issued during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Units
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: Value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockRedeemedOrCalledDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Redeemed or Called During Period, Value
StockRedeemedOrCalledDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock bought back by the entity at the exercise price or redemption price.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and have not been retired and are not held in treasury. Some state laws may govern the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017MeasurementPeriod.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Measurement Period Adjustment, Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017MeasurementPeriod.description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) for measurement period adjustment from accounting for tax effect pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TransferMortgagePayable.label: Transfer Mortgage Payable
TransferMortgagePayable.description: The fair value of transfer of mortgage payable in noncash investing or financing activities.

TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.label: Treasury Stock Acquired, Average Cost Per Share
TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.description: Total cost of shares repurchased divided by the total number of shares repurchased.

UndistributedEarnings.label: Undistributed Earnings, Basic
UndistributedEarnings.description: The earnings that is allocated to common stock and participating securities to the extent that each security may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed.

UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) Allocated to Participating Securities, Basic
UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

UndistributedEarningsLossAvailableToComm.label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) Available to Common Shareholders, Basic
UndistributedEarningsLossAvailableToComm.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to common stock as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Carrying Amount, Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.description: The carrying amount of the consolidated Variable Interest Entity's assets included in the reporting entity's statement of financial position.

VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Carrying Amount, Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.description: The carrying amount of the consolidated Variable Interest Entity's liabilities included in the reporting entity's statement of financial position.

VariableInterestEntityOwnershipPercentag.label: Variable Interest Entity, Qualitative or Quantitative Information, Ownership Percentage
VariableInterestEntityOwnershipPercentag.description: Percentage of the Variable Interest Entity's (VIE) voting interest owned by (or beneficial interest in) the reporting entity (directly or indirectly).

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.label: Write off of Deferred Debt Issuance Cost
WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.description: Write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance cost in an extinguishment of debt.

InsuranceRecoveries.label: Insurance Recoveries
InsuranceRecoveries.description: The amount recovered from insurance. These recoveries reduce costs and losses that are reported as a separate line item under operating expenses.

ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementInvesting.label: Proceeds from Insurance Settlement, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementInvesting.description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of insurance claim, classified as investing activities. Excludes insurance settlement classified as operating activities.

UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) Allocated to Participating Securities, Diluted
UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.label: Sale of Stock, Number of Shares Issued in Transaction
SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.description: The number of shares issued or sold by the subsidiary or equity method investee per stock transaction.

OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.label: Other Operating Income (Expense), Net
OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operations.
